name: GetQuoteLineItems
description:
Fetch line items from a specified quote.

Use this tool to retrieve a list of line items associated with a specific quote. This includes both a summary of the first few items and a URL for accessing the complete, paginated list.

parameters.name: quote_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the quote whose line items are to be retrieved.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor_ending_before
parameters.description: The object ID to define your place in the list for fetching the previous page.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `ending_before` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, starting with `obj_bar`, your subsequent call can include `ending_before=obj_bar` in order to fetch the previous page of the list.

parameters.name: fields_to_expand
parameters.description: List of field names to expand in the response for detailed information.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

parameters.name: max_items_to_return
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of line items to return, ranging from 1 to 100. Defaults to 10 if not specified.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: pagination_starting_after_cursor
parameters.description: The object ID to define your place in the list for pagination, used to fetch the next page after the specified object.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `starting_after` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, ending with `obj_foo`, your subsequent call can include `starting_after=obj_foo` in order to fetch the next page of the list.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Stripe API.
